ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Amount_Value__c ) ),Amount_Value__c!=0.00) ,OR(NOT( ISBLANK( Calculate_Installment_Amount_as__c ) ), NOT(ISBLANK( Total_Charge_Value_Minus__c))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Entering in %Amount Value,You cannot insert in Calculate Installment Amount as(%) and in Total Charge Value Minus or After Entering in Calculate Installment Amount as(%) and in Total Charge Value Minus,You cannot enter in %Amount Value
